frameDefinitions: A Protagonist has made a Commitment but does not honor it, thereby doing harm to an Affected_party.
This frame concerns an Addict's physiological or psychological compulsive dependence on an Addictant, the substance or behavior to which the Addict is addicted. ''
A Speaker addresses a Proposal made by an Interlocutor, either agreeing to it or rejecting it.

An individual that is scheduled to be a Participant, or already is a Participant in an Activity or an Organization, indicates that  they will no not or no longer participate in that Activity or Organization.
In this frame a Speaker ceases speaking, sometimes about a particular Topic.
AForgoer decides not to partake in something ordinary that is otherwise Desirable.
frameExamples: My buddy Tom's girlfriend <t>backed out</t> of going to the show with me.
Although she was never a big fan of drugs, she became <t>hooked</t> on that designer drug instantly.
They were <t>rebuffed</t> again in the larger city of Provo. CNI
The Moslem contingent had <t>withdrawn</t> from the EC talks on May 27.
Finally, Jan <t>shut</t> <t>up</t> about his car accident.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is the person who has committed themselves to do something and later does not follow through on it.
The individual or group to whom the <fen>Protagonist</fen> had made the <fen>Commitment</fen> and who is negatively affected by the <fen>Protagonist</fen>'s not honoring the <fen>Commitment</fen>.
An expression of the commitment that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> has taken on earlier and which they fail to follow through on.
The time period during which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> fails to honor their commitment.
The location in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen>  fails to honor the commitment they made.
The <fen>Addict</fen> is physiologically or psychologically dependent on a substance or a behavior.
<fen>Addictant</fen> is the substance or behavior to which the <fen>Addict</fen> is dependent.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who communicates the reply or response.

This is the person who made the <fen>Proposal</fen> to the <fen>Speaker</fen> and to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates  their response. This frame element stands in for the <fen>Proposal</fen> and is only licensed when the <fen>Proposal</fen>  can be understood from the context.
The <fen>Proposal</fen> is the prior communication or action to which a response is given.
The time interval during which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes their verbal response.
The location in which the <fen>Speaker</fen>  makes a verbal response.
The individual or individuals that are engaged or are scheduled to be engaged in an <fen>Activity</fen>.
The event that the Participant is engaged in or was scheduled to be engaged in.
The <fen>Organization</fen> is an intentionally formed human social group with some definite structure to which the <fen>Participant</fen> belongs.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Participant ends their participation in the Activity.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Participant ends the participation in the Activity.
The <fen>Speaker</fen> has previously been speaking but has now stopped.
The <fen>Expressor</fen> is the <fen>Speaker</fen>'s voice or other communicative noise emitted by the <fen>Speaker</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> is when the becoming silent occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the location where the becoming silent occurs.
The <fen>Forgoer</fen> decides not to partake in the desirable activity or event.
<fen>Desirable</fen> identifies the event or activity in which is the <fen>Forgoer</fen> does not partake.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the the forgoing occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the forgoing occurs.
listRoleExamples: The human rights situation is infinitely better now than under the Taliban, but <fex>the Bush administration</fex> has reneged on its pledge of a new Marshall Plan.
Two people backed out <fex>on me</fex> a few days earlier.
It appears that Schwarzenegger will renege <fex>on an agreement he made with teachers</fex>.
When a host city backed out <fex>at the last minute</fex> and Russellville, Ark., landed the opportunity to host the Babe Ruth 16-Year-Old World Series.

But his efforts came to nought when 18 of the 19 accused were bailed out as most
witnesses backed out <fex>in court</fex>.
<fex>Iran</fex> on Saturday rejected Europe's proposal for ending the standoff over Tehran's nuclear program.

But senior SLN officials had rebuffed <fex>the man who is ever so willing to please
the guerrillas</fex>.
Dr. Carolyn Herrington has accepted <fex>our offer to become Dean of the College of Education</fex> .
This must make <fex>yesterday's</fex> Taliban rebuff all the more wounding.
Legislation that would have required smaller school districts to share administrators has been rebuffed repeatedly <fex>in the Oklahoma House of Representatives</fex>.
Instead, <fex>he</fex> was challenged by Neil Gaudry, and withdrew from the race when it appeared that he would not be victorious.
In any event , in mid-April he withdrew <fex>from the contest</fex>.
This led to the decision to withdraw <fex>from IMF agreements</fex> in May 1987 .
